title: Baked fish and chips
description: Baked fish and chips by the Greek chef Akis Petretzikis. A step-by-step recipe for the famous English dish with cod and potatoes in the oven!
instructions:
--- For the yogurt sauce ---
Step 1: In a small bowl add the yogurt, lemon juice, dill, olive oil, salt, pepper, and mix them with a spoon.
Step 2: Refrigerate the sauce until needed.
--- For the cod ---
Step 3: Spread some paper towels on the bottom of a baking pan and set it aside.
Step 4: Place the cod on a cutting board.
Step 5: Use a sharp knife to remove its skin and cut it into small pieces.
Step 6: Transfer the cod pieces to the baking pan with the paper towels and lightly press them with your hands to remove their excess moisture.
Step 7: Transfer the cod to a large bowl, add salt and pepper, mix with your hands, and set it aside until needed.
Step 8: Preheat the oven to 180째C (350째F) set to fan.
Step 9: In a chopper blender add the bread, garlic, parsley, paprika, oregano, olive oil, salt, pepper, and beat them until the ingredients are homogenized and you get a crust of seasonings.
Step 10: Transfer the mixture to a small bowl.
Step 11: Crack the eggs into a third bowl and whisk them with a fork.
Step 12: Put the flour into a fourth bowl.
Step 13: Line a baking pan with parchment paper and set it aside.
Step 14: Dip each cod piece successively into the flour, the eggs, and the seasonings.
Step 15: Transfer the cod pieces to the baking pan with the parchment paper and bake them in the oven for 15-20 minutes.
--- For the potatoes ---
Step 16: Place a pot over medium heat, add the water, vinegar, salt, and bring to a boil.
Step 17: Peel and cut the potatoes into thin strips that are 1.5x1.5 cm thick.
Step 18: Add the potatoes into the pot and boil them for 10 minutes.
Step 19: Increase the oven's temperature to 230째C (450째F) set to fan.
Step 20: Take a baking pan and set it aside.
Step 21: Remove the potatoes with a slotted spoon and transfer them to the pan.
Step 22: Add the olive oil to the pan and mix it well with the potatoes to coat them.
Step 23: Bake them in the oven for 20 minutes.
Step 24: Remove the potatoes from the oven, mix them with a spatula, and bake them for another 20 minutes.
Step 25: Transfer the potatoes to a bowl, add salt, and mix them with the spatula.
--- To serve ---
Step 26: Serve the cod with the potatoes and the yogurt sauce, and garnish with lime slices and fresh coriander leaves.
ingredients: 100 g light strained yogurt; 2 tbsp lemon juice; 1 tbsp dill (finely chopped); 1 tbsp olive oil; 1 pinch salt; 1 pinch pepper; 1 kg cod ((fresh or frozen), boneless); 1 pinch salt; 1 pinch pepper; 150 g whole wheat bread; 1 clove(s) of garlic; 2 tbsp parsley; 1 tsp paprika (smoked); 1 tsp oregano; 2 tbsp olive oil; 2 piece eggs (medium); 100 g all-purpose flour; 1 l water; 2 tbsp vinegar; 1 pinch salt; 2 piece potatoes (medium); 5 tbsp olive oil; 1 piece lime(s) (cut into slices); 1 pinch coriander leaves
